attributes.action: introduce emergency legislation to ensure that when MPs who employ family members terminate that employment as a result of rule changes, any compensation payments ordered are paid by the MP and NOT the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these cases the employer is the MP and it is NOT the public who are the employer.  If any of these employees who have their contracts terminated claim for wrongful dismissal, any payment of compensation should come from the employer - the MP - and NOT from the employer's employer - us!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
